html.p: I believe experience is best gained through practice. I have joined the work force right after graduation, trying to find a path best suited to my abilities. While I feel comfortable working in customer service, I have found my biggest strengths to be in the technical field. I'm looking for employment that will properly utilize my abilities and will allow for both professional and personal growth, appreciate innovation and extra effort.

subsection.title: ANIXE Sp. z o.o. â€¢ OCT 2021 - TODAY

Working night shifts & long shift hours, remote or in office

Live services monitoring, issue escalation accoring to available documentation, including past incidents
Complex client service and incident management under SLA's deadlines
Log files collection and root cause analysis
Making Rest API request queries,
Regression testing of web applications
Meeting PCI standards in incident management
Creating component tests, test procedure automation, webhook integration
Documentation: Writing instructions for newly implemented tools or new procedures, composing incident reports
Working with static geographic data
Creating scripting tools for job automation, data aggregation and analysis
Some other stuff
